name: Toy Box Blast 2017
description:
TAP, BLAST & COLLECT THE TOYS!
Welcome to Toy Box Blast an amazing & exciting Match 3 Puzzle with 200 exciting Levels


Toy Box Blast Gameplay is really addicting & fun to play. Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the stuck toys.
Be careful as It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited!

Blast the blocks and enjoy this Joy Land adventure!

200 puzzles of this game is distributed on a Big Map of different amazing worlds. You have to help Anne the little girl throughout this adventurous journey to overcome troubles & gather stuck toys.



Top Features
● Amazing graphics and Gameplay Inspired by Toy Blast
● Beautiful Graphics
● All kinds of beautiful toys; cars, rockets, stuffed toys and many more...
● 200 levels with exciting puzzles
● Numerous boosters
● Get Extra Lives by watching Rewarded Video Ads
● Unlimited Retries to play a level
● Gamecenter Integration
● Sounds & Vocal Sounds
● Free Updates with exciting new puzzles every week
& Much More


Download Toy Box Blast today & start paying this amazing puzzle game.
